## RichText.setStyleInternal() method

`setStyleInternal` applies the style of the given range. 01. split nodes with from and to 02. style nodes between from and to

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setStyleInternal(range: RGATreeSplitNodeRange, attributes: {
        [key: string]: string;
    }, editedAt: TimeTicket): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  range | RGATreeSplitNodeRange | range of RGATreeSplitNode |
